a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-EN-GIN lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN ša {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ ṭe₃-e-mu šu-u₂ iq-ṭi-bi-ia ma-a har-ra-nu ša 03 lim {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ te-te-li-ia {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ {ANŠE}KUR.RA-MEŠ gab-bu ina KUR-i šu₂-nu a-na-ku zak-ku-u₂ a-du UGU-šu₂-nu a-na {URU}zab-ban a-du {KUR}da-du-ni al-lak u₂-ta-ak-šu₂-nu EN.NUN-MEŠ u₂-še-il-la TA@v am-ma-ka a-sa-hu-ra ina GIR₃ KUR-i al-la-ka pi-iq-ta-te {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ an-nu-te x x x x ina UGU ša x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x-me il-x x x x x x x x i-su-ri LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ gab-bu x x x x x ša x x x x a-du x x x x x x+x x x+x x x x {ANŠE}KUR-MEŠ {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ x i-ba-ši ina x+x x x-u
